structure.unit: TRAFFIC REGULATIONS -- VEHICLE EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE

law.catch_line: Recreational vehicles -- Access to public highways -- Definitions.

text.section: A recreational vehicle that is one hundred two (102) inches in width and is registered under KRS 186.050, 186.655, or an equivalent statute from another state shall have access to any public state-maintained highway in Kentucky and the vehicle's appurtenances and width exclusion safety devices shall not exceed the limits defined in this section. A recreational vehicle shall not exceed established weight limits on Kentucky highways without first obtaining an overweight permit issued under this chapter.

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 34, sec. 1, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 96, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2003.
